```py
import cv2
import numpy as np

img = cv2.imread('images/chess_board.png')
gray = cv2.cvtColor(img, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)
gray = np.float32(gray)
dst = cv2.cornerHarris(gray, 2, 23, 0.04)
```
